import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";

import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";

import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Upload an external mapping file to Logz.io storage.</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/v1/sawmill/external-mapping/upload"}></MethodEndpoint>



Uploads an external mapping file in `.properties` format to Logz.io storage. This file can be used later by Sawmill [ExternalMappingSourceProcessor](https://github.com/logzio/sawmill/wiki/External-Mapping-Source-Processor). This feature is not available by default. To enable it, contact Logz.io support. 10 files can be uploaded per account. The file size is limited to 50 MB. 
Please ensure to change the region in the URL to match your account's region.


## Request

successful operation

Exceeded allowed amount of mapping files per account - 10. Please Contact Support to delete old mappings."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"requestId"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>parameters</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"currentLimit"} required={false} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","example":10}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"errorCode\": \"FILE_RESTRICTIONS/EXTERNAL_MAPPINGS_LIMIT_REACHED\",\n  \"message\": \"Failed to upload external mapping. Exceeded allowed amount of mapping files per account - 10. Please Contact Support to delete old mappings.\",\n  \"requestId\": \"string\",\n  \"parameters\": {\n    \"currentLimit\": 10\n  }\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"422"} value={"422"}><div>

validation error

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"result"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"Failed to update external mapping","description":"Failed to update external mapping"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"result\": \"Failed to update external mapping\"\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
